mapping.text:
=string.concat("Hello<@",$activity[Mapper].output.event.user, ">
I am *Smart Contract Bot* :information_desk_person:

 How can I help you today? 

 	_1. Translate Contract_ 
	_2. I'm just wandering around!_ :slightly_smiling_face: ")

text.text:
Welcome to the *Smart Contract App* on Slack. 
You can quickly send below message to receive the available Menu List. 

 `@smart contract automation hello`

You're *Awesome*!   :partying_face: 

See you soon with more contracts! :tada: 
- Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:

mapping.text:
=string.concat("Hello <@", $activity[FileContents].output.event.user, "> :wave: 

Thanks for sharing your contract with us. 
 Details we received for processing:","

"," Contract Name:	 _",$activity[FileContents].output.event.files[0].name,"_ 
 File Size (KB) :	 ",(($activity[FileContents].output.event.files[0].size)/1024)," 
 Target Language:","	",$activity[get_SourceLang].output.data,"

Please wait while we translate your contract :page_facing_up: document to the target language. 
")

mapping.initial_comment:
=string.concat("Hello again <@",$flow.body.user,">	:mega:, 

*Good News* - your contract document is processed successfully. Attached is your translated contract document :books: 

 We have also uploaded the copy of your translated document to  <https://docs.google.com/document/d/",$activity[GoogleDocsGet].Output.id,"/view# | Google Drive > 

 See you soon with more contracts! :tada: 
")
